main.name: Nishil Faldu
main.occupation: I am a student of Computer Science
main.description: I love programming, reading, traveling, and cafe-exploring
main.bio: Hi there! My name is Nishil and I enjoy creating things. My interest in computers started back in late 2019 when I decided to take my first programming course - turns out I did not do well in that class. Fast-forward to today, and I have had the privilege of working at a huge company, a joint venture of libraries and colleges, and a student-led research. My main focus these days is building digital experiences through web applications and machine learning models for the community. In my free time, I can be found trying different coffee shops, reading books, or taking nature walks.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to work on cool projects!

work.title: Software Engineering Intern

projects.title: The Poetry Project
projects.category: Django, Python, PyTorch, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

testimonials.text: Nishil is one of the best student workers I've had the pleasure to work with. He consistently overachieves in the tasks and projects he's been given. He is creative, thoughtful and thorough in how he approaches technical and theoretical problems, and has the ability to grasp new concepts quickly. He has been instrumental in developing NLP modeling and visualization applications since he began with us a year ago.
